trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_SEQ_00<tab>This straight-arrow sutler is struggling to convince the Resistance fighters.
TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_TODO_01<tab>Use the blowgun to shoot the targets at the designated location.
TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_SUTLER02651_000_001<tab>I rushed here after hearing that Rhalgr's Reach had been attacked by the Empire, bringing all the goods I could carry with me.

TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_SUTLER02651_000_002<tab>One of the weapons I brought was a blowgun. I think it a fairly useful tool, but none of the Resistance fighters seem to agree. Could you help me show them all how handy it can be?
TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_SUTLER02651_000_003<tab>I know it will serve them well in their fight. They simply do not realize it yet. Please meet me by the targets I have set up.
TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_ENTHUSIASMSOLDIER02651_000_004<tab>Do you seriously think we can fight the Empire with a children's toy?

TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_SUTLER02651_000_010<tab>I have prepared four targets for you. Hit them all to show how splendid a weapon the blowgun is. Make sure to first choose your target before blowing with all your might.
TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_ENTHUSIASMSOLDIER02651_000_011<tab>Do you seriously think we can fight the Empire with a children's toy?

TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_SUTLER02651_000_012<tab>I have prepared four targets for you. Hit them all to show how splendid a weapon the blowgun is. Make sure to first choose your target before blowing with all your might.
TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_SUTLER02651_000_020<tab>Absolute perfection! The Resistance fighters were transfixed by your display.

TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_SUTLER02651_000_021<tab>If one is able to get close enough to an enemy, they could use the blowgun to shoot a poison dart right into their neck. It really can be quite handy in the right situation.

TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_SUTLER02651_000_022<tab>I got the idea from an Ala Mhigan I met in the Black Shroud. He said he'd seen some locals hunting with it and wondered if the Resistance couldn't find a use for it.
TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_SUTLER02651_000_023<tab>It just goes to show you don't need to pick up a sword to fight against the Empire. We all have our own parts to play.
TEXT_STMBDZ101_02651_ENTHUSIASMSOLDIER02651_000_024<tab>Yes, I can already imagine how blowguns could help us when ambushing imperial soldiers.
